text: Season seven of Game of Thrones has arrived, bringing death to numerous characters within the very first episode. * * Spoilers for the season premiere ‘ Dragonstone ahead * * No scene was quite as horrific as the cold opening which saw Arya Stark murder the entire Frey family, retribution for the infamous Red Wedding. Wearing Walder Frey ’ s face, the girl - who - now - has - a - name welcomed the character ’ s heir ’ s into the Twin ’ s great hall, toasting their recent success with “ proper wine for proper heroes ”.
